QuestData.Title: Battle Tested
QuestData.Description:
A weapon like this could really turn the tide against King Mechagons Troops. Let's go see how their gear matches up against our new toy.
Take out King Mechagon's Sentries wherever you can find them
QuestData.LogDescription: Eliminate $1oa Upgraded, Anodized, or Corroded Sentry wherever you find them.
